      • paintMorphViewPanel

        public void paintMorphViewPanel(java.lang.Object graphicsContext,
                                Dim size)
        Draw the MorphView's breeding box outlines (if showBoxes is set) and its morphs, on the MorphView's centre panel. Morph phenotypes have a background color, which PhenotypeDrawer instances may use to fill the bounding rectangle of the morph. In order to also paint the morph's background color within its breeding box, this implementation iterates through the morph collection in box number order, and builds a list of background colors to be passed to BoxesDrawer.draw().
        Specified by:
        paintMorphViewPanel in interface MorphViewPanel
